sentences.english: What do you think of High school students' purchasing stock?
sentences.chinese: 你如何看待高中生学炒股票？

sentences.english: He lost his fortune gambling on the stock exchange.
sentences.chinese: 他因炒股票损失了他的财产。

sentences.english: Some people become rich by winning the lottery or playing the stock market.
sentences.chinese: 有些人有钱是因为中了彩票或者炒股票赚了一笔。

sentences.english: He had hurried to speculate on stocks, but had made no money.
sentences.chinese: 他急急地炒股票，一点钱也没赚得。

sentences.english: He wants to make quick money so he trades stocks in speculation.
sentences.chinese: 他想尽快赚钱，所以他去炒股票。

sentences.english: So far I haven't heard any economist dare to invest stocks.
sentences.chinese: 迄今，没听说过哪个经济学家敢炒股票。

sentences.english: He earned no money for investing into stock market urgently.
sentences.chinese: 他急急地炒股票，一点钱也没赚得。
